content: of each stitch around 3 sides of bag do not skip stitches when the last stitch in completed bind off and weave in end turn the bag right-side-out and smooth seam version a follow the same instructions for version a only with wrong sides facing each other version a rather than going through both loops of each stitch go through the 2nd loop of the first square and the 1st loop of the second square in other words the 2 loops that are touching the loops that were not used will form a small ridge version b place squares together with right sides facing chain 1 going through both loops of the first stitch in the upper right corner of the bag make 1 slip_stitch repeat slip_stitch through both loops of each stitch around 3 sides of bag do not skip stitches when the last stitch in completed bind off and weave in end turn the bag right-side-out and smooth seam design by shannon johnson 2008 version b follow the same instructions for version b only with wrong sides facing each other version b rather than going through both loops of each stitch go through the 2nd loop of the first square and the 1st loop of the second square in other words the 2 loops that are touching the loops that were not used will form a small ridge handle join yarn to bag with a slip_stitch in top right front corner of bag chain 40 sts or until desired length achieved join with a slip_stitch to top left front corner of bag chain 1 slip_stitch in each chain back across to top right front corner bind off and weave in ends repeat on other edge of bag going from the top right back corner to the top left back corner and back again design by shannon johnson 2008
